skills.skill: HLSL, Cg, or Other Shader Programming Language

duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize C/C++ programming and HLSL, Cg, or other vendor-specific shader programming language for graphics development.
Optimize performance factors and memory footprints using hardware and software profilers like PIX, GCM Replay, Tuner, Vtune, etc.
Debug graphics pipelines using relevant platform tooling such as Renderdoc, Pix, Razer, etc.
Work with 3D graphics APIs including Direct3D 11+, OpenGL, Vulkan, and/or vendor-specific APIs.
Apply multithreaded programming techniques and work with large code bases for graphics development.
